meanings.sent1: The two houses on the street were unakin in style.
meanings.sent2: Their tastes in music were unakin, one loved rock while the other preferred jazz.
meanings.sent3: It was quite unakin for the cat to enjoy swimming in the pool.
meanings.sent4: The friendship between the cat and the fish was unakin but strong.
meanings.sent5: The unakin colors of the two cars made them easy to tell apart.

meanings.sent1: Wearing a swimsuit to a formal event would be unakin attire.
meanings.sent2: His loud laughter was unakin during the solemn ceremony.
meanings.sent3: It would be unakin to bring a beach ball to a chess tournament.

meanings.sent5: The unakin behavior of the guests disrupted the peaceful party.
